title: The congressman and the possibly Holy Grail | Politics
content:
After Pope Francis finished his speech to Congress on Thursday, a Pennsylvania congressman walked up to the rostrum and swiped the half-empty glass from which the Holy See had just sipped. Glass in hand, Democratic Rep. Bob Brady carefully walked back to his office where he, his wife, a friend and a staffer took turns sipping the water from the glass.Pennsylvania Sen.
